status_on.title: Send Notice
status_on.description: Select yes if you want email to be sent to users when the report's status is changed or not.

status_address.title: Reply-To
status_address.description: Enter the email address where you want to receive replies from users.

status_title.title: Subject
status_title.description: Enter the subject for the sent emails.

status_mail.title: Content
status_mail.description: Enter the email content you want to be sent to users when the report status was changed by an admin. You can use the following varibles inside the mail body {USER_NAME} {USER_EMAIL} {REPORT_NAME} {EXPENSE_LOCATION} {EXPENSE_DATE} {EXPENSE_AMOUNT} {EXPENSE_NEW_STATUS} {EXPENSE_OLD_STATUS}.
